card.name: Summon Skeletons
card.text: Summon three Skeletons

card.name: Zombie
card.text: Remove one Corpse token from board. When killed, flip this card.

card.name: Flesh Pile
card.text: At the start of the controlling player's turn, flip this card.

card.name: Summon Zombie
card.text: Summon a Zombie

card.name: Necromancer's Orders
card.text: Command three Minions to attack as if it were the Minion phase.

card.name: Overwhelming Dominance
card.text: Command all minions to attack as if it were the Minion phase.

card.name: Bone Necropolis
card.text: Bone Necropolis summons one skeleton at the start of each turn

card.name: Golem Pit
card.text: Once per turn, annihilate two minions to summon a Flesh Golem.

card.name: Flesh Golem
card.text: Once per turn, Flesh Golem may consume a corpse to restore 3 health.

card.name: Willing Sacrifice
card.text: Destroy any number of minions. Draw a card for every minion destroyed this way.

card.name: Summon Acolyte
card.text: Summon one Acolyte.

card.name: Acolyte
card.text: When this minion is destroyed, create a Corpse token.

card.name: Profane Rite
card.text: Sacrifice 5 acoltyes to summon a greater abomination

card.name: Unholy Chapel
card.text: As long as Unholy Chapel is in your structure zone, you may pay 1 mana to summon an Acolyte

card.name: Graveyard
card.text: Once per turn, you may pay 1 mana to create 2 Corpse tokens

card.name: Greater Abomination
card.text: This minion may attack twice per Minion command.

card.name: Drain Essence
card.text: Deal one damage to each minion in your own Minion Zone. Restore health equal to twice the total damage done

card.name: Unholy Blast
card.text: Sacrifice a minion to deal 3 damage. If this minion was an Acolyte, deal 2 additional damage

card.name: Necromancer's Apprentice
card.text: As long as this minion is alive you may play a spell costing 2 mana or less for free each turn.

card.name: Sinister Betrayal
card.text: Sacrifice a minion and gain 1 mana. If the minion is named Necromancer's Apprentice. Gain 3 mana.

card.name: Unlimited Power
card.text: Create one zombie for each Corpse token on your board.

card.name: Life Tap
card.text: Lose 10 Health, then gain 2 Mana.
